name: SimpleVRExperience
description:
This Is A Very Early Demo Of SVRE

In the current Alpha Demo of the game, you are able to explore a simple low poly environment by flying around. Future releases will feature much more exciting gameplay.

Current Features:

  1. Debug Menu
    1. Used for Adjusting Max Velocity
    2. Can Toggle Vehicles for better Performance
  2. Simple VR Player

Upcoming Features:

  1. Main Menu
  2. Settings Page
  3. MiniGames, Level Selection, and More!
  4. Improved VR Player(More Movement Options)
